home.supportText: need help ? Contact our support team
home.appDescription: Your one stop palce to find all your needed local services and where you can enjoy fast and hight quality services.

taxi.title: Taxi
taxi.subtitle: Get the nearest taxi arrount and get your destinatiion asap .

food.title: Food
food.subtitle: Discover most delicious dishes from the nearest restaurants .

restaurant.emptRestaurantList: There are no registered restaurants yet.

dailog.title: Warning
dailog.subtitle: You already have some items in your cart from another restaurant, do you want to check them out first or overwrite them?

cart.clearCartConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the cart ?
cart.deleteItemConfirm: Would you like to delete this item?

checkout.cancelOrderConfirm:
Are you sure you want to
cancel this order?

helperText.preparing: Your order is being prepared by the restaurant
helperText.readyForPickUp: Your order is prepared and ready for pickup by the delivery driver'
helperText.onTheWay: Your order is on the way
helperText.delivered: Your order has been successfully delivered
helperText.canceledByAdmin: Your order has been cancelled by the restaurant
helperText.recievied: Your order is recieved by the restaurant

inviteCode.inviteCodQuestion: Do You Have An Invite Code?

signInAlert.title: You need to be signed in to add items to your cart

laundry.firstStep: First step is creating an order once you create an order one of our drivers will be reaching your location to pickup your things
laundry.laundryPricingNote: Order weight and total cost will be updated once the laundry service receive your order.

orderHelper.atLaundry: the laundry is processing your order
orderHelper.otwDelivery: Our driver is on the way to deliver back your order
orderHelper.otwPickup: Our driver is on the way to pick up your order from your location
orderHelper.pickedUp: order picked up from your location successfully
orderHelper.ready: your order is ready for delivery
orderHelper.received: Order received and will be procceed as soon as possible

laundry.secondStep: Second step our laundry service provider will recieve your order and start doing his work and we will inform you about price changes depending on the order weight
laundry.thirdStep: Final step once your order is ready one of our drivers will pickup the order from the laundry and get it to your location as soon as possible

taxiView.outOfPuerto: You are too far out of puerto
taxiView.priceEstimate: Estimated price for the ride is $
taxiView.noRide: Sorry to inform you this ride does not exist anymore.
taxiView.forwardSuccess: You ride has been successfully forwarded to a local taxi
taxiView.taxiRideCheckedTooltip: This shows how many drivers have received your offer but did not find the offer acceptable.
taxiView.taxiRequestPriceTooltip: How much are you willing to offer for this ride? We will broadcast your offer to all taxi drivers near you, they will accept your order only if they find the offered price acceptable.
taxiView.taxiRidePriceTooltip: Click + - to increase/decrease your price by 5. If you see your order not being accepted try them out.

cancelOrder.title: Confirm Cancelation.
cancelOrder.question: Are you sure you want to cancel your Order ?
cancelOrder.taxiCancelled: Sorry to inform you the taxi cancelled the ride.
cancelOrder.orderExpired: Sorry to inform your taxi request is expired.

savedLocations.title: Saved Locations

addLocationDialog.title: enter location name, if you want to save for future use, else you may skip

savedLocations.savedLocationsListEmpty: Your Saved locations list is empty
savedLocations.clickBtnToAddNewLocation: Add new location by clicking the button below

pickLocation.pickLabele: Search for location or move map and pick location

incoming.title: Incoming  Orders
incoming.isInTax: Please finish|your ride|to accept new orders
incoming.toggleDesc: Turn on to see new orders

taxiView.tooFarFromstartRide: Click start ride after the customer has reached your vehicle. Based on your GPS it seems you are still far from customer location, are you sure you still want to start the ride?
taxiView.tooFarFromfinishRide: Click Finish after the customer has exited your vehicle. Based on your GPS it seems you are still far from customer's end location, are you sure you still want to end the ride?
taxiView.noRide: Sorry to inform you this ride does not exist anymore.

cancelOrder.question: Why do you want to cancel the ride?
cancelOrder.confirmation_text: Are you sure you want to cancel the current ride?
cancelOrder.customerCancelled: Sorry to inform you the customer cancelled the ride.
cancelOrder.rideUnavailble: Sorry to inform you that the ride is not available any more.

orders.title: Orders
orders.onTheWayMessage: is on the way now to pick you up
orders.inTransitMessage: Your ride is on the way
orders.searchingMessage: You are being matched with a taxi

introduction.howToTaxi: Do You Want To Use The Mezcalmos App To Give Rides To Customers In Puerto Escondido?
introduction.signUpTaxi: Click Sign Up, Show Us Proof  Of Your Taxi Authorization  And Start Giving Rides    Right Away.
introduction.confirmation: Your Application Is Under Review. We Will Contact You Shortly

unauthorizedScreen.subTitle1: You are not authorized, please contact Alejandro

snackbars.serverCommunicationError: Failed to communicate with the server :(

permissions.cameraAccessOffBody: Apparently you denied the app from Camera access, go to General > APP > Allow Camera!
permissions.photoAccessOffBody: Apparently you denied the app from Photo Library access, go to General > APP > Photos and change None to something else.
permissions.askForNotif: The app collects your location Data to match you with the best rides and share your location with customers, even when the app is in background.
permissions.locationPermissionDenied: Oops, Sadly without location permissions you can not use our application!
permissions.locationPermissionDeniedForever: Location permissions are denied forever! Please change that.

login.title: Connect using Facebook or using SMS !
login.enterPhoneNumber: Enter phone number to recieve OTP code
login.twilioNote: By continuing you will receive a verification code to your phone number by SMS. Message and data rates may apply.
login.wrongOTPCode: The Confirmation code is Wrong, please try again.
